title: I have an advanced maths subject expert account in Chegg. Which advanced maths book is good for answering maths questions in Chegg? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you are an advanced maths expert, you need to read a number of books for that. Some of them are 1. Greenberg Advanced Mathematics 2. Elementary Number Theory and its applications by Kenneth H. Rosen. 3. Erwin Kreyszig Advanced Engineering Mathematics. There are many more.
